methods.name: containsVariable
methods.doc: <static> Returns if a value contains a variable of not.

methods.name: getPropertyName
methods.doc: <static> Returns the name of the property contained in the provided variable.

methods.name: getPropertyPath
methods.doc: <static> Returns the path to the property contained in the provided variable.

methods.name: getStoreName
methods.doc: <static> Returns the name of the store contained in the provided variable.

methods.name: getVariables
methods.doc: <static> Returns the variables contained into a value.
